records.uncertainty_note: Latitude and Longitude are 0.000000, indicating placeholder values. Location is specified as Lesvos, which is an island.

possible_violations.legal_basis: EU Charter of Fundamental Rights and its Article 8 (2)

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of torture and inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment
possible_violations.legal_basis: EU Charter of Fundamental Rights and its Article 4
Frontex Code of Conduct applicable to all persons participating in Frontex operational activities: Article 10 (b)

records.context_note: A complaint was forwarded to Human Resources regarding a cultural mediator's alleged improper behaviour from November 2019 to January 2020 on Lesvos. The mediator was accused of humiliating migrants, taking copies of travel documents with a mobile phone, and searching bags. Legal provisions allegedly violated include the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights (Article 8(2) on personal data, Article 4 on torture/inhuman treatment) and Frontex Code of Conduct (Article 10 on Behavioural Standards). The cultural mediator was suspended from future Frontex deployments following conversations, and a final report was produced on 15.04.2021.
records.evidence_quote: The alleged improper behaviour of the cultural mediator concerned was observed while interacting with migrants performing alleged actions of humiliation, taking copies of migrant's travel documents with a mobile phone, searching the migrants' bags, etc.
